task_summary: The robot is tasked to unfold a wrinkled towel using its bimanual arms, starting from detection and grasp through to the unfolding and final placement.

task_long_description.overview: This episode features a dual-arm robot operating on an artificial grass workspace with a wrinkled towel positioned centrally. The robot must locate the towel visually, approach and align its grippers, grasp the towel with a pinch strategy, perform an unfolding maneuver via pulling, then place the towel down in a more extended, flattened configuration. The sequence aims for robust perception, careful manipulation, and successful completion without tear or misplacement.
preconditions: Towel is within workspace and visible to cameras
Robot arms are initialized and grippers are open
stepwise_plan: Check if towel is visible; scan if not found
Approach and align grippers to towel
Grasp towel gently with pinch strategy
success_criteria: Towel is unfolded flat with minimal remaining wrinkles
No damage to towel or workspace
Robot arms and grippers properly released
failure_and_recovery: Failure to perceive towel: trigger additional scanning
Grasp failure: retry up to three times
Towel slips: attempt to regrasp and continue unfolding
task_long_description.termination: Task terminates when towel lies unfolded and arms retreat; or after timeout/failure limits reached.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is visible to sensors.
Scans for the towel using a grid pattern, up to three attempts.
Moves and aligns grippers to the towel within tight tolerance.
Grasps the towel gently using a pinch strategy.
Executes unfolding by pulling the towel for two fold actions.
Places the unfolded towel down on the workspace.
Retreats arms away from the towel after placement.

recovery_strategy: Retry scan or detection up to three times
Abort if not completed after maximum attempts
assumptions: Frames show bimanual manipulation consistent with instruction; full unfolding visible only by frame_8.
Exact number of folds inferred visually; num_folds set to 2, matching two main unfold steps seen in frames 3→5 and 5→7.
No explicit mention of force or tolerance in instruction; set to minimal bins for gentle handling and precision.

expected_success_criteria: Towel visibly unfolded flat in final frame (frame_8)
No visible wrinkles or bunching remaining
